column1: Provides a system of progressive sanctions and
services available to the Juvenile Court System
for Youth before the court on petitions for
Children in Need of Services (Chins), Children in
Provides secure detention services for youth
before the Juvenile Court on pre-adjudication,
delinquent, and/or felonious charges and the
provision of post-disposition services for those
youth adjudicated and sentenced by the Court.
